I will come and spend the night. He must not be left like this. Every moment is precious. I can't think why his nieces put it off. Perhaps God will help me to find a way to prepare him I . . . Adieu, Prince! May God support you . . ." 
"Adieu, ma bonne/' answered Prince Vasili turning away from her. 
"Oh, he is in a dreadful state," said the moth- 
3 o er to her son when they were in the carriage. "He hardly recognizes anybody."
